## Software Carpentries
Software Carpentries workshops are offered in person over two-days, including breakfast, lunch, and snacks. Topics covered will depend on the specific workshop, but could include R, python, SQL, Unix, and more.  

### Introduction to Data Analysis in Python
**When:** February 8-9, 2024, 9am-5pm\
**Where:** [HELIX](https://maps.app.goo.gl/3w96QNsCt9ASd3d77){target="_blank"} GS155 (Alder)\
**Instructors:** Rebecca Barter, Alec Chapman\
Contact [Penny Atkins](mailto:penny.atkins@hsc.utah.edu) with any inquiries. [Register to save your spot!](https://forms.gle/wGrVndw1pbrzb9fX9){target="_blank"}
Additional information can be found on the [website](https://uofudelphi.github.io/2024-02-08-python/){target="_blank"}.
